item.title: Let's Code AWS CDK
item.description:
Let’s Code AWS CDK

Overview

  • “Let’s Code AWS CDK” which is The AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK), an open-source software development framework to define your cloud application resources using familiar programming languages.

  • We will cover the Flavors of CDK Construct, Creating CDK Project in Python, and Step-by-Step Deployment CDK project.

  • It is hosted by AWS UserGroup Mumbai to spread the knowledge of AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK)

  • Speakers.
